The examination of Edw. Fitzharris, relating to the Popish plot taken the tenth day of March, 1680/1 published in print by order of the House of Commons the twenty fifth of March, 1681. Fitzharris, Edward, 1648?-1681. Clayton, Robert, Sir, 1629-1707. Treby, George, Sir, 1644?-1700.
18 p.
Printed for Thomas Fox ..., London : 1681.
A deposition of Fitzharris, signed: Rob. Clayton, Geo. Treby. Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
